activities.loc: MDB Check Monitor & Posted Calendar for Courtroom

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Letter to the Clerk of Court with letter from Employer
NEW EMPLOYER.  ATTORNEY FEES. $50.00 PER MONTH STARTS IMMEDIATELY.

4:12 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Trevor L Stoner in court.  Attorney Andrew Joseph Harrington in court for Trevor L Stoner. 

4:12  Court relates and gives appearances.
4:12  Officer Kevin Reinikainen called, sworn, direct by State.  Witness identifies defendant.
4:16  Cross by Atty. Harrington.
State moves for bind-over.
Court finds probable cause; bound over.
Arraignment set; must appear in person.  
Bond to continue.
Arraignment scheduled for November 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Attorney fees.  Andrew Harrington appointed.  Repay $50.00 per month starting 07/29/2022.
Preliminary hearing on August 8, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Andrew Harrington to be repaid at the rate of $50.00/month to begin 7/29/22.

records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
11:01 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Trevor L Stoner in court. Attorney Andrew Harrington appears by zoom video.
Court relates Defendant qualifies for public defender, but counsel has not been appointed yet.  Blue form given to complete and case to be recalled.  11:10 a.m. back on the record.  Blue form given and Defendant sworn.  Court relates and appoints Attorney Andrew Harrington to be repaid $50.00 per month starting 07/29/22 by wage assignment.  Defendant is to stop at the clerks office today.  Address confirmed and phone number updated. 11:21 a.m. case recalled.  Court relates.  Attorney Harrington relates and waives time limits.  Prelim set.  Address and phone number confirmed.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 04:00 pm.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

10:07 AM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Trevor L Stoner appeared by video, in custody at Rusk County Jail.  Attorney Michael Steuer appears by zoom video for Defendant for today only.  
Court relates no counsel has been appointed yet.  Attorney Steuer relates.  Court resets AIA and must appear in person if not in custody at Rusk County.  Otherwise arrangements are to be made with the jail to appear by video.  Bail continues.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 29, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Office of State Public Defender Appointment of Counsel Report

Defendant shall be fingerprinted at the Barron County Sheriff's Dept., if not already done.
If represented by the Public Defender and does not have a phone, must contact the Public Defender weekly at 715-908-8473.

12:58 PM Prosecuting attorney Brian H. Wright Aty in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Trevor L Stoner appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Dustin Matthew Rockow (for today only) appeared by video for Trevor L Stoner. 

1:00  court relates and gives appearances.
Defendant acknowledges receipt of complaint and waives further reading of the same.
Defendant must call the public defender's office to determine eligibility.  If the defendant does not qualify for public defender representation, the defendant must complete a Petition for Appointment of an Attorney, Affidavit of Indigency also known as the blue form in order for the court to consider appointing an attorney. 

AIA set.

(Bond and MS scanned to jail)
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
